body}addonsConfigurationErrorsCollection:addonsConfigurationErrorsCollection(limit:50,locale:\"en\"){items{genericError}}}componentSocConfigCollection:autoDeploySocCollection(limit:50,locale:\"en\"){items{entryTitle skuId externalId province mininumFinanceAmount deviceType}}}portInStepper{portInPrompt portInCopy inputExistingNumber{label errorMessage{requiredError ovPortInContentsCollection{items{...section}}}}}}}}}fragment button on ResourceButton{copy alt variants val}fragment label on ResourceLabel{label}fragment ueReturnModal on ResourceUeReturnModal{entryTitle header body returnPhone payUpfrontEdgeAmount returnPhoneDescription returnPhoneSummary cancelCta{...button}proceedCta{...button}returnCondition1{...label}returnCondition2{...label}returnCondition3{...label}}fragment autoPayLoseOfferModal on longText on ResourceLongText{text}fragment errorModal on ResourceHupErrorModal{entryTitle header body subText cancelCta{...button}proceedCta{...button}}fragment resourceErrModal on ResourceErrorModal{header body subText proceedCta{...button}cancelCta{...button}}fragment section on ResourceSection{entryTitle header body}fragment inputField on ResourceInputField{label helperText errorMessage{...errorMessage}successMessage popoverText}fragment errorMessage on ResourceErrors{genericError formatMismatch lengthError requiredError}","applicationId":"UTEFidoCare"}
